name: swmfac
description: SWMFAC eGis widget in Web App Builder

scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdir build && ncp app build && npm run uglify && npm run cssnano
scripts.uglify: find build/widgets/*/*.js -exec uglifyjs {} -m -c drop_console -o {} ; && find build/jimu.js/*.js -exec uglifyjs {} -m -c drop_console -o {} ; && find build/themes/FoldableTheme/widgets/*/*.js -exec uglifyjs {} -m -c drop_console -o {} ;
scripts.cssnano: find build/widgets/*/css/*.css -exec postcss {} -o {} ; && find build/jimu.js/css/*.css -exec postcss {} -o {} ;
